Text:
Bad cropping: small black border left and right.  However this is still the best rip out there (for example better than the BOZX 4.4GB 720p) and it hasn't been over sharpened or excessively denoised or over cropped.

screen to show crop: http://bayimg.com/FaHAPaAdm

That's a compressed image (jpeg) and not an uncompressed raw screenshot, so don't take it as a representative of image quality, it's only to illustrate the crop.
